data.name: Empower
data.tooltip: Empowers target friendly unit with <d ref="duckiesHeroHellborneEmpower_Buff.modifiers[0].amount" style="Bold"/><Bold>%</> increased damage and <d ref="duckiesHeroHellborneEmpower_Buff.modifiers[1].amount" style="Bold"/> additional life regeneration for <d ref="duckiesHeroHellborneEmpower_Buff.duration"/> seconds.
